title: Maruti Suzuki India to export EVs to Europe, Japan soon
description: Maruti Suzuki India plans to export high-specification electric vehicles with a range of 500 km, powered by a 60 kWh battery. The company aims to increase customer confidence by offering multiple EV products and after-sale support. They also plan to develop biofuel and hydrogen models to combat carbon emissions and increase exports significantly by 2030.
